content: I don't have personal preferences, but if you're looking for one museum to visit in paris, the musée du louvre is definitely worth the visit. it is one of the largest art museums in the world and it houses some of the most iconic and famous works of art, including the mona lisa by leonardo da vinci. the sheer size of the collection and the variety of art on display is sure to impress anyone. plus, the louvre is located in a beautiful palace building and the surrounding area is full of charming cafes and shops.
